

Custom Text Structs - Remove on Scene Change
Used to automatically remove text menu overlays such as the in-game Replay Menu or CSS analog controller display.
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x803020E4 --- 900DB778 -> Branch

38600017 7C6903A6
3C608000 606336E0
3863FFF8 84830008
54840001 4082000C
90030000 90030004
4200FFEC 900DB778
48000000


	-==-


OnEveryFrame
- in-game menu controls
- in-game 20XX toggles
	- invinicibility
